name: Light Inside Darkness
description:
You are a little white star, flying among void full of other colorful stars. Your light keep you alive, but in the course of time... it go out. You have to touch blue orbs to absorb their energy and stay alive. Try touch other orbs, they also can help you survive. But be careful, there are many red orbs and traps which make your life more difficult.

Will you survive in this strange world...?

Controls:

ActionKey/ButtonMovementWSAD or Arrow keys
Pause Game
QRestart Game
R

Note:

The game was originally pulished on Game Jolt 6 month ago. Since I made itch.io account, I decided that I will publish it here too.

Have fun! :D
